title: CAN SOME PLEASE DUO QUEUE WITH ME IN RANKED
body:
solo queue is cancer asf i get teammates that likes to face check the jg when they clearly see 3 enemies roaming in it.
i get useless adcs every single time.
i get "yasuo mains" on my team. 
etc etc etc 
pls i need someone to climb with

replies.body:
dang dude.. I checked ur history u rockin it most of the time.. dunno how you are bronze 4.. good luck. Usually out farming everyone and just going for towers wins the entire game in bronze.. You obviously can kill the enemy, but ignore them and just get towers...

If you aren't going for towers.. and your teammates aren't going for towers.. you wont win games. You can run around all u want and go 15/7 helping your teammates.. at the end of the day.. making a path to the nexus wins games..
42% win ratio bronze 4. you never gonna climb with those stats no matter who you duo with
